body_html:
Thank you for your help.
Well, I think I have occurred an interesting problem and I have to say everything clearly.
At first, I was trying the code in Pytorch tutorial, which is "Training a classifier". I followed the instruction, and I found that I didn't install torchvision, so I installed torchvision via pip install torchvision. I have a python installed on the system and a python contained in Anaconda. I think I have mixed them here. Whatever, torchvision is installed and I successfully downloaded CIFAR10 dataset. But latter, I occured RuntimeError: freeze_support(), just as #5858 described. I think this error consumed my memory. Because, after that, I found that the error I described above come up. Just now, when I was browsing websites, chrome can't open webpages, it crashed and told me no enough memory. I restared my computer, and this error Traceback (most recent call last): File "E:\cs231n\pytorch_learn.py", line 1, in <module> import torch File "D:\Software\Anaconda\lib\site-packages\torch\__init__.py", line 80, in <module> from torch._C import * ImportError: DLL load failed: 页面文件太小，无法完成操作 disappeared. It's weird.

body:
Thank you for your help.
Well, I think I have occurred an interesting problem and I have to say everything clearly. 
At first, I was trying the code in Pytorch tutorial, which is "Training a classifier". I followed the instruction, and I found that I didn't install torchvision, so I installed torchvision via `pip install torchvision`. I have a python installed on the system and a python contained in Anaconda. I think I have mixed them here. Whatever, torchvision is installed and I successfully downloaded CIFAR10 dataset. But latter, I occured `RuntimeError: freeze_support()`, just as [#5858](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/5858) described. I think this error consumed my memory. Because, after that, I found that the error I described above come up. Just now, when I was browsing websites, chrome can't open webpages, it crashed and told me no enough memory. I restared my computer, and this error `Traceback (most recent call last): File "E:\cs231n\pytorch_learn.py", line 1, in <module> import torch File "D:\Software\Anaconda\lib\site-packages\torch\__init__.py", line 80, in <module> from torch._C import * ImportError: DLL load failed: 页面文件太小，无法完成操作` disappeared. It's weird.
